mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_seeker_info(seeker_id, ename, cname, military, bohun, disabled, nation, profile, category1_no, category2_no) VALUES(user_seeker_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ename}, #{cname}, #{military}, #{bohun}, #{disabled}, #{nation}, #{profile.originalFilename}, #{category1No}, #{category2No})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_seeker_info SET ename = #{ename}, cname = #{cname}, military = #{military}, bohun = #{bohun}, disabled = #{disabled}, nation = #{nation}, category1_no = #{category1No}, category2_no = #{category2No} profile = #{profile.originalFilename} WHERE SEEKER_ID = #{seekerId}
mapper.select: SELECT si.ename, si.cname, si.military, si.bohun, si.disabled, si.nation, si.profile FROM user_info ui INNER JOIN user_seeker_info si ON ui.user_id = si.user_id WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId}
